official_title: Implementing an Evidence-Based, Multilevel Intervention to Promote HPV Vaccination Among HIV Positive Adults
inclusion_criteria:
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 45 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Has contraindications to receiving the HPV vaccine i.e., history of an anaphylactic allergy to latex, an immediate hypersensitivity to yeast, current moderate or severe acute illness, and/or are currently pregnant)
miscellaneous_criteria:
Inclusion Criteria

* HIV positive
* 18-45 years of age
* Can read and speak English
* Capable of providing informed consent
* Has not previously received three series HPV vaccine
* No contraindications to receiving HPV vaccine (i.e. history of anaphylactic allergy to later, an immediate hypersensitivity to yeast, current moderate or severe acute illness, and/or are currently pregnant).
